jobs.title: Information Technology Intern
description: Decommissioned retired laptops and staged 200+ devices using Ivanti to image systems, install essential software, configure authentication, deploy security patches, and ship equipment on schedule.
Provided remote technical support by coordinating client sessions via ScreenConnect to diagnose and resolve hardware, software, and connectivity issues.
Tracked device deployment and lifecycle status using custom Excel spreadsheets and Track-It!, ensuring accurate asset management and on-time delivery.
Collaborated with IT team members and team leads, communicating progress and issues through Teams and Outlook to support daily operations.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed a Flutter mobile application in Dart that stored food inventory via barcode scanning and generated AI-driven recipes.
Built and maintained a Python backend responsible for authentication, user management, and API integrations.
Collaborated with the design team using Figma to design and iterate on new application pages, contributing to improved user experience and interface consistency.
Led development of the CoralAI physical device, enabling automated tracking of food entering and leaving a pantry and synchronizing inventory data with the mobile application.
Managed Apple TestFlight deployments and organized GitHub issues and milestones to support structured team development workflows.
Led the programming team and coordinated cross-functional collaboration with design and management stakeholders.

jobs.title: Prototype Programmer
description: Led a team of programmers, artists, and designers to develop multiple video game prototypes.
Developed 3D games in Unity using C#.

jobs.title: Camp Counselor
description: Supervised and ensured the safety and well-being of children aged 5-12.
Certified in CPR and First Aid.
Planned, organized, and led age-appropriate recreational activities.

jobs.title: Production / Technical Director
description: Developed internal management software for scheduling, contacts, messaging, and basic AI functionality.
Managed production staff and coordinated weekly assignments.
Designed and hosted the weekly 'Indie Spotlight' specialty show every week, including music and on-air breaks.
Upgraded station infrastructure by installing new ENCO servers and broadcast boards.

jobs.title: Level 3 Hockey Referee
description: Officiated 300+ USA Hockey games across Adult, Bantam, Pee Wee, and Squirt levels.
Served as a referee and linesman for 16U and 18U games.
Officiated 20 Big Bear hockey tournaments.
